message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $90. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $75? I appreciate your understanding.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget. While I value the product at $80, I'm willing to come down to $78. This would allow me to make a reasonable profit while still offering you a good deal. Let me know if this works for you.
